entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add HTTP3 tests for Android platform handler #64410
  • Document when each of the vectorization approaches should be used #64409
    7.0.0
  • Mono debugger crashes attempting to breakpoint in a DIM in a generic interface #64408
  • Closing the AsyncWaitHandle from the result of socket.BeginConnect crashes the application in .NET 6.0 #64400
  • Remove `Verify` macros in `importer.cpp` #64399
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: inconsistent case on GC environment variable names #64393
  • JIT rolling build can build and upload non-JIT changes #64392
    7.0.0
  • GCGenerationRange events missing from Generation Aware Analysis on Linux #64390
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out in the CI #64389
  • ArrayList.ToArray(type) throws exception for enum type in Blazor WebAssembly #64387
    6.0.x
  • Mono incorrectly handles conversion of negative doubles to nint #64386
  • SupportedOSPlatform/UnsupportedOSPlatform do not support delegate types #64384
  • Vector3.Cross calculates wrong value #64375
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions. #64381
    7.0.0
  • Review documentation and test coverage for multimodule assemblies #64367
  • Test failure CancelKeyPressTests.ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler #64364
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.parseTest.RunParseToStringTests #64363
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\MDArray\\GaussJordan\\plainarr_cs_d\\plainarr_cs_d.cmd #64362
  • UseNativeHttpHandler=true is not trimming correctly on mobile apps #64361
    6.0.MAUI

Closed

  • Reflection.Emit does not reliably allow use of CreateSpan<T> with non 8 byte aligned data #62314
    7.0.0
  • TryGetNameInfo_LocalHost tests failing with HostNotFound #55576
    7.0.0
  • System.RuntimeType.MakeGenericType throws NotImplementedException #32743
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support streaming deserialization of JSON objects #64182
  • [API Proposal]: RequiredMemberAttribute and NoRequiredMembersAttribute #64248
    7.0.0
  • Add Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core support to Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility for .NET Standard #64334
  • [API Proposal]: Add X509SubjectAlternativeNameExtension #64388
  • [API Proposal]: RemoteCertificateValidationCallback cannot detect future certificates #63830
    7.0.0
  • Ssl3 tests failing on Windows 11 #64372
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Serializer Behavior Changes Depending on Object Interfaces #64302
  • Mono calli does not setup LMF #64073
    7.0.0
  • ArrayPool<T>.Return should clear specified number of elements in array #64382
  • Support IsSpecified properties like Json.Net to handle JSON Merge Patch #64380
  • Double.ToString(format) not throwing FormatException #64295
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51371
    7.0.0
  • Update when Vector256<T>.IsHardwareAccelerated returns true #64309
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add (e.g.) `out bool created` to MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen() #60664
  • `NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged` event leaks threads on Linux #63788
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] BrowserHttpHandler to support large/streaming requests via ReadableStream #64333
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] the value "$(JsonToItemsTaskFactoryTasksAssemblyPath)" of the "AssemblyFile" attribute in element is not valid #63994

PullRequests

Created

  • [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Change condition on RegexReductionTests to be explicit about trimming #64411
  • Fix ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler test #64407
    area-System.Console
  • Remove pinning from StringBuilder #64405
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix some nullability warnings in NativeAOT CoreLib #64404
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-vs4mac' #64403
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix BigInteger outerloop test failure #64402
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64398
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add incremental build instructions when ... #64396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64391
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.3
  • Copy propagation tweaking #64378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    community-contribution
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Add support for byref fields in NativeAOT/crossgen2 #64366
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Metrics UpDownCounter #64365
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated to return true only on AVX2 #64345
  • Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64385
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Temporarily disable EC file import tests #64397
    area-System.Security
  • Disable ipv6 lookup tests when needed #64313
    area-System.Net
  • Remove workarounds for RemoteExecutor (dotnet/arcade#5865) #64360
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Re-enable tests that call MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType arguments #64344
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • 2 fixes related to commit/decommit #64316
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix arm64 genInstrWithConstant #64368
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add attributes for required members #64287
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • ARM64: Avoid LEA for volatile IND #64354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [docs] Collecting stack traces with native symbols on WebAssembly #64383
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix minor things in comments to DllImportGenerator #64088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Remove some of the unused resource strings #64379
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Always store to allocas in OP_LLVM_OUTARG_VT #64303
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid inlining the wrappers used by CALLI. #64290
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Override all `Read` methods in `NullTextReader` and `NullStreamReader` #64301
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run Pi tests on a different queue, which runs ARM32 tests #64353
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up RegexCode opcodes and debug-only tracing #64346
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Reverse `ASG(CLS_VAR, ...)` #63957
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Simplify the creation of diagnostics using DiagnosticId #64250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Codespaces] Make it possible to run wasm samples in the browser #64277
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Removing `tiVerificationNeeded` in the JIT #64356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64352
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • gcc compilations for ARM64 can not initialize extern "C" variables. #64239
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable osr stress tests for libraries and add fixes #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose or cancelationToken #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix Issue #21678: Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #64347
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add/use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #64357
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    area-Debugger-mono
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Use byteCount when deciding what instruction sequence to use in genCodeForCpBlkUnroll #64315
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.15 #64304
    area-Meta, 6.0.3
  • [wasm][debugger] Move the breakpoint line after applying changes #64359
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName #64062
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fold inbox crypto into one assembly #64307
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
